<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" ALIGN="center">


<IMG SRC="g318595g80m68.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
 </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>HESS CORPORATION </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right">April&nbsp;28, 2017 </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><I>Dear Stockholder: </I></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">You are cordially invited to attend the annual meeting of stockholders, which will be held at Hess Corporation, 1501 McKinney
Street, Houston, Texas 77010, on Wednesday, June&nbsp;7, 2017, at&nbsp;9:00 a.m., local time. The formal notice of annual meeting and proxy statement, which are contained in the following pages, outline the action to be taken by the stockholders at
the meeting. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">We are pleased to furnish our proxy materials to our stockholders over the internet, as permitted by
Securities and Exchange Commission rules. We believe this process will enable us to provide you with a convenient way to access our proxy materials, while reducing the costs and environmental impact of our annual meeting. A paper copy of our proxy
materials may be requested through one of the methods described in the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><B>It is important that your shares be represented at the meeting whether or not you are personally able to attend.
Accordingly, after reading the attached Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders and Proxy Statement, please promptly submit your proxy by telephone, internet or mail as described in your proxy card or Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy
Materials. If you submit your proxy over the internet, you will have the opportunity to agree to receive future stockholder documents electronically via email, and we encourage you to do so. If you have received a paper copy of the proxy materials
and choose to submit your vote by traditional proxy or voting instruction card, please sign, date and mail the card in the pre-addressed reply envelope provided to you. Your cooperation will be appreciated. </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><I>Sincerely yours, </I></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" ALIGN="center">


<IMG SRC="g318595g09t67.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
 </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><I>Chief Executive Officer </I></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">The attached proxy statement is dated April&nbsp;28, 2017 and is first being mailed to stockholders on or about April&nbsp;28,
2017. </P>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:8pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><B>CAUTIONARY NOTE REGARDING FORWARD-LOOKING STATEMENTS</B> </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:8pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">This document contains &#147;forward-looking&#148; statements, as defined under the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995. Generally,
the words &#147;anticipate,&#148; &#147;estimate,&#148; &#147;expect,&#148; &#147;forecast,&#148; &#147;guidance,&#148; &#147;could,&#148; &#147;may,&#148; &#147;should,&#148; &#147;believe,&#148; &#147;intend,&#148; &#147;project,&#148;
&#147;plan,&#148; &#147;predict,&#148; &#147;will&#148; and similar expressions identify forward-looking statements, which generally are not historical in nature. Forward-looking statements related to our operations are based on our current
understanding, assessments, estimates and projections. Forward-looking statements are subject to certain risks and uncertainties that could cause actual results to differ materially from our historical experience and our current projections or
expectations. As and when made, we believe that these forward-looking statements are reasonable. However, caution should be taken not to place undue reliance on any such forward-looking statements since such statements speak only as of the date when
made and there can be no assurance that such forward-looking statements will occur. We are not obligated to publicly update or revise any forward-looking statements, whether as a result of new information, future events or otherwise. Risk factors
that could materially impact future actual results are discussed in our Annual Report on Form 10-K, Quarterly Reports on Form 10-Q, and other filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission. </P>

 </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>HESS CORPORATION </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><A NAME="toc318595_1"></A>NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>Wednesday, June&nbsp;7, 2017, at 9:00 a.m. </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><I>To the Stockholders: </I></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">The
annual meeting of stockholders of Hess Corporation will be held at Hess&nbsp;Corporation, 1501&nbsp;McKinney Street, Houston, Texas 77010, on Wednesday, June&nbsp;7, 2017, at 9:00 a.m., local time, for the following purposes: </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:4pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

statement); </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:2pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

April&nbsp;19, 2017, the record date for the annual meeting, will be entitled to vote at the meeting. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">By order of the board of directors,

<P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>YOUR VOTE IS IMPORTANT </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><B>You are urged to date, sign and promptly return the proxy card in the envelope provided to you, or to use the telephone or internet method
of voting described in your proxy card, so that if you are unable to attend the meeting your shares can be voted. </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><B>Important Notice
Regarding the Availability of Proxy Materials for the Annual Meeting of Stockholders to be held on June&nbsp;7, 2017: </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B>Hess Corporation&#146;s
notice of meeting, proxy statement and 2016 annual report are available at <U>http://www.envisionreports.com/HES.</U></B> </P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:15pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><FONT COLOR="#21a32b"><B><A NAME="toc318595_2"></A>PROXY SUMMARY </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="line-height:3.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #21a32b">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">The following section is only a
summary of key elements of the proxy statement. It is intended to assist you in reviewing the proxy statement in advance of the annual meeting of stockholders. This summary does not contain all of the information you should consider, and we
encourage you to read this entire proxy statement before submitting your votes. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B>Your vote is important to us. Please exercise your right to vote.
</B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><U>Voting Matters and Board Recommendation </U></B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" ALIGN="center">

<TR BGCOLOR="#edf9d8" STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" COLSPAN="3" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman">1. <B>Election of twelve
director nominees</B></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt" BGCOLOR="#edf9d8">
<TD HEIGHT="8" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD>

<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><U>Nominees for Director </U></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I>Directors are elected annually by a majority of votes cast, for a one-year term expiring in 2018. </I></B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><U>Board Refreshment and Tenure </U></B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font-size:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" ALIGN="center">


<IMG SRC="g318595g24l04.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
 </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right">iii </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><U>Business and Strategy </U></B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="98%"></TD></TR>


<TR BGCOLOR="#26962d" STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt; padding-right:2pt"><FONT COLOR="#ffffff"><B><FONT COLOR="#ffffff">Summary of Hess&#146;
Business</FONT></B></FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt; padding-right:2pt">
<P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">We are a leading global independent energy company engaged in the exploration and production of crude oil and natural gas. In response to the
low oil price environment over the last two years, we remained disciplined investing in our growth projects while maintaining a strong balance sheet and liquidity position. As a result of this capital discipline, we entered 2017 in a position of
strength, well placed to capitalize on opportunities to deliver improving returns and value to our stockholders as commodity prices improve.</P></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="98%"></TD></TR>


<TR BGCOLOR="#26962d" STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt; padding-right:2pt"><FONT COLOR="#ffffff"><B><FONT COLOR="#ffffff">2016 Corporate Performance
Highlights</FONT></B></FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt; padding-right:2pt">
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">We achieved strong operating performance in 2016, even as we reduced activity, by driving operating efficiencies, significantly reducing cash
operating costs, advancing developments and achieving exploration success. Operating highlights include:</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Successfully implemented 50 stage
completions design for Bakken wells, increasing production efficiency and estimated ultimate recovery</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Continued to drive down Bakken
drilling and completion costs per operated well to $4.8&nbsp;million in 2016, compared to $5.8 million in 2015, by leveraging lean manufacturing practices</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reduced E&amp;P capital and
exploratory expenditures by 54% compared to 2015</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Restructured organization to reduce
overhead and costs</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Maintained a strong balance sheet
with $2.7 billion of cash and total liquidity including available committed credit facilities of $7.3&nbsp;billion at year-end 2016</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Significant additional discoveries
at the Liza and Payara prospects in the Stabroek block in Guyana</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Replaced 119% of production at a
finding and development cost of approximately $13 per boe</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="98%"></TD></TR>


<TR BGCOLOR="#26962d" STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt; padding-right:2pt"><FONT COLOR="#ffffff"><B><FONT COLOR="#ffffff">Strategy</FONT></B></FONT></TD></TR>

<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt; padding-right:2pt">
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">Our strategy is to maintain a portfolio that is balanced between onshore and offshore, unconventional and conventional, and U.S. and
international, allocating capital for the best long-term value and risk-adjusted returns. This portfolio provides an attractive mix of short- and long-cycle investment opportunities that support our production growth. Our growth trajectory is
underpinned by the following key areas:</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><I></I><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT><I></I><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Bakken</I>: We
have a leadership position in the play and plan to go from two to six rigs over the course of 2017.</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Offshore developments</I>:
Expected to add a combined 35,000 boepd of net production, including:</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:6.00em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">&#149;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;North Malay Basin, which is expected to begin production in 2017</P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:6.00em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">&#149;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Stampede in the
Gulf of Mexico, which is expected to begin production in 2018</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Exploration</I>: The Liza
discovery in the Stabroek block offshore Guyana has been confirmed as one of the largest oil discoveries of the past decade. A second significant oil discovery in the Stabroek block was confirmed at the Payara prospect.</P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">Sustainability risks, including climate change, are reviewed
by our board of directors and taken into account in formulating our company strategy. Our board of directors regularly reviews and actively challenges management on our strategy and is fully supportive of the strategy and of its implementation by
management.</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
</TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right">iv </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><U>Executive Compensation </U></B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="98%"></TD></TR>


<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt" BGCOLOR="#26962d">
<TD HEIGHT="8" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#26962d" STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt; padding-right:2pt"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><FONT
 COLOR="#ffffff"><B><FONT COLOR="#ffffff">Response to Low Oil Price Environment</FONT></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt; padding-right:2pt">
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">Given the current low oil price environment, and our disciplined approach to executive compensation, the compensation and management
development committee approved and certified the following compensation actions for 2016:</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Held salaries flat for our NEOs since
2014</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
 COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Paid out 2016 annual incentive plan at 93.5%, which was below target for the second consecutive year</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Held flat annual incentive plan targets
for all but one NEO, whose annual incentive plan target was increased in 2016 due to a significant increase in his job responsibilities (which also included a special, one-time restricted stock award)</P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reduced grant date values of long-term
incentive (&#147;LTI&#148;) awards for NEOs in 2016 by 15% from 2015 levels</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Paid out 2014-2016 performance share
units (&#147;PSUs&#148;) at 67% of target given the company&#146;s relative total shareholder return (&#147;TSR&#148;) versus peers</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">

<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt; padding-right:2pt"> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The compensation and management
development committee eliminated restricted stock from the CEO&#146;s LTI mix in 2016 and beyond so that 100% of his LTI is performance contingent (70% PSUs and 30% stock options)</P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The compensation and management
development committee decided to hold the CEO&#146;s salary and target bonus flat in 2017 and reduced his LTI award by 10% from target</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:3.50em; text-indent:-1.50em; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The CEO&#146;s compensation program is
closely aligned with stockholder returns as illustrated in the Realizable Compensation table on page 32</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:8pt" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="49%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="46%"></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt" BGCOLOR="#21a32b">
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="3" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#21a32b" STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:8pt">
<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="3" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt; padding-right:2pt"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><FONT
 COLOR="#ffffff"><B><U></U><FONT COLOR="#ffffff">Compensation Program Key Practices, Promoting Alignment with Stockholder Interests</FONT></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>


<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:8pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt"><FONT COLOR="#21a32b"><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>What We Do</U></B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; padding-right:2pt"><FONT COLOR="#ff0200"><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>What We Don&#146;t Do</U></B></FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:8pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt">
<P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:2.00em; text-indent:-2.00em; font-size:8pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Directly link pay to performance
and stockholder returns</P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; padding-right:2pt">
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; margin-left:2.00em; text-indent:-2.00em; font-size:8pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#bc0000">X</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NO hedging or pledging by
executives</P></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:8pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt">
<P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:2.00em; text-indent:-2.00em; font-size:8pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#26962d">&#10003;</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Target total direct compensation
within range of market median</P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; padding-right:2pt">
<P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:2.00em; text-indent:-2.00em; font-size:8pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify"><FONT COLOR="#bc0000">X</FONT>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NO employment contracts for
NEOs</P></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:8pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt">

compensation payments</P></TD>

awards</P></TD></TR>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" ALIGN="center">


<IMG SRC="g318595g80m68.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
 </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:14pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>HESS CORPORATION </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><A NAME="toc318595_3"></A>PROXY STATEMENT </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">The enclosed proxy is solicited by the board of directors of Hess Corporation for use at the annual meeting of stockholders to
be held on Wednesday, June&nbsp;7, 2017, at 9:00 a.m., local time, in our office at 1501 McKinney Street, Houston, Texas 77010. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">On or about April&nbsp;28, 2017, we commenced mailing this proxy statement, the notice of annual meeting and the proxy card to
stockholders. Holders of record of common stock of the company at the close of business on&nbsp;April 19, 2017 will be entitled to vote at the annual meeting. Each share of common stock will be entitled to one vote. As of April&nbsp;19, there were
317,906,584 shares of common stock outstanding and entitled to vote at the annual meeting. There are no other voting securities of the company outstanding. A majority of the outstanding shares of common stock, present in person or represented by
proxy, will constitute a quorum at the annual meeting. Abstentions and broker non-votes will be counted as shares present for purposes of determining the presence of a quorum for the transaction of business. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">In accordance with Securities and Exchange Commission (&#147;SEC&#148;) rules, we are making our proxy materials available to
stockholders over the internet. On or about April&nbsp;28, 2017, we mailed a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials to our stockholders (the &#147;Notice&#148;). The Notice contains instructions on how to access this proxy statement and
our annual report and submit a proxy over the internet. If you received a Notice by mail, you will not receive a paper copy of the proxy materials unless you request such materials by following the instructions contained in the Notice. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">If at the close of business on&nbsp;April 19, 2017 your shares were held in an account at a brokerage firm, bank, dealer, or
other similar organization, then you are the beneficial owner of shares held in &#147;street name&#148; and the proxy materials, as applicable, are being forwarded to you by that organization. The organization holding your account is considered the
stockholder of record for purposes of voting at the annual meeting. As a beneficial owner, you have the right to direct that organization on how to vote the shares in your account. If that organization is not given specific direction, shares held in
the name of that organization may not be voted and will not be considered as present and entitled to vote on any matter to be considered at the annual meeting, except with respect to the ratification of the company&#146;s independent auditors.
<B>Brokers are not permitted to vote your shares for the election of directors, for the advisory vote on executive compensation, for the advisory vote on frequency of the vote on executive compensation, for the approval of the 2017 long term
incentive plan or for or against the stockholder proposal without your instructions as to how to vote. Please instruct your broker how to vote your shares using the voting instruction form provided by your broker so that your vote can be
counted</B>. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right">1 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">If you are a registered stockholder, you can simplify your voting by using the
internet or calling a toll-free telephone number. Internet and telephone voting information is provided on the proxy card or Notice. A control number, located on the instruction sheet attached to the proxy card or Notice, is designated to verify
your identity and allow you to vote your shares and confirm that your voting instructions have been recorded properly. If you vote via the internet or by telephone, there is no need to return a signed proxy card. However, you may still vote by proxy
by using the proxy card. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">Proxies will be voted at the annual meeting in accordance with the specifications you make on the
proxy. If you sign the proxy card or submit a proxy by telephone or over the internet and do not specify how your shares are to be voted, your shares will be voted in accordance with the recommendations of the board of directors (See &#147;Questions
and Answers about the Annual Meeting and Voting&#148;). </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right">2 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>

<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:15pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><FONT COLOR="#21a32b"><B><A NAME="toc318595_4"></A>QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:15pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><FONT COLOR="#21a32b"><B>ABOUT THE ANNUAL MEETING AND VOTING </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="line-height:3.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #21a32b">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I>Why did I receive these proxy materials?
</I></B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">You have received these proxy materials because you are a Hess Corporation stockholder, and our board of directors
is soliciting your authority, or proxy, to vote your shares at the 2017 annual meeting of stockholders. The proxy materials include our notice of annual meeting of stockholders, proxy statement and 2016 annual report. If you requested printed
versions of these materials by mail, these materials also include the proxy card or voting instruction form for the annual meeting. Proxy cards are being solicited on behalf of our board of directors. The proxy materials include detailed information
about the matters that will be discussed and voted on at the meeting, and provide updated information about our company that you should consider in order to make an informed decision when voting your shares. The proxy materials are first being
furnished to stockholders on or about April&nbsp;28, 2017. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">The following proposals are scheduled to be voted on at the
annual meeting: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

regarding carbon asset risk. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I>Can I access the proxy materials on the internet? </I></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">Yes. The company&#146;s notice of annual meeting, proxy statement and 2016 annual report are available at
<U>http://www.envisionreports.com/HES</U>. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">In accordance with SEC rules, we are making our proxy materials available to
stockholders over the internet. On or about April&nbsp;28, 2017, we mailed a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials to our stockholders. The Notice contains instructions on how to access this proxy statement and our 2016 annual report
and submit a proxy over the internet. If you received a Notice by mail, you will not receive a paper copy of the proxy materials unless you request such materials by following the instructions contained in the Notice. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">The Notice also includes instructions about how to request delivery of future proxy materials electronically by e-mail, and we
encourage you to do so. Choosing to receive future proxy materials by e-mail will save us the cost of printing and mailing the materials to you and will reduce the impact of our annual meeting on the environment. If you choose to receive future
proxy materials by e-mail, you will receive an e-mail prior to the next stockholder meeting containing links to the proxy materials and the proxy voting website. Your election to receive proxy materials by e-mail will remain in effect until you
change it. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right">3 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I>How do I attend the annual meeting? </I></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">The annual meeting will be held at Hess Corporation, 1501 McKinney Street, Houston, Texas 77010 on Wednesday, June&nbsp;7, 2017
at 9:00 a.m., local time. When you arrive, signs will direct you to the appropriate room. Please note that the doors to the meeting room will not be open until 8:00 a.m. You should be prepared to present valid government-issued photo identification,
such as a driver&#146;s license or passport, for admittance. In addition, if you are a stockholder of record, your name will be verified against the list of stockholders of record prior to admittance to the annual meeting. If you are a beneficial
owner, you must provide proof of beneficial ownership, such as your account statement showing that you own our stock, a copy of the voting instruction form provided by your broker, trustee or nominee, or other similar evidence of ownership. If you
do not provide valid government-issued photo identification and comply with the other procedures outlined above, you will not be admitted to the annual meeting. Directions to attend the annual meeting can be found at
<U>www.hess.com/company/hess-offices</U>. You do not need to attend the annual meeting to vote. Even if you plan to attend the annual meeting, please submit your vote in advance as instructed herein. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I>What is the quorum requirement for holding the 2017 annual meeting? </I></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">A majority of the outstanding shares of common stock, present in person or represented by proxy, will constitute a quorum at
the annual meeting. Abstentions and broker non-votes will be counted as shares present for purposes of determining the presence of a quorum for the transaction of business. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I>Who can vote? </I></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">Holders of record of common stock at the close of business on April&nbsp;19, 2017 will be entitled to vote at the annual
meeting. Each share of common stock will be entitled to one vote on all matters properly brought before the meeting. As of April&nbsp;19, 2017, there were 317,906,584 shares of common stock outstanding and entitled to vote at the annual meeting.
There are no other voting securities of the company outstanding. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I>What is the difference between holding shares as a holder of record and as a
beneficial owner? </I></B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">If at the close of business on April&nbsp;19, 2017, the record date for the annual meeting, your
shares were held in an account at a brokerage firm, bank, dealer, or other similar organization or other nominee, then you are the beneficial owner of shares held in &#147;street name&#148; and the proxy materials, as applicable, are being forwarded
to you by that organization. The organization holding your account is considered the stockholder of record for purposes of voting at the annual meeting. As a beneficial owner, you have the right to direct that organization on how to vote the shares
in your account. If that organization is not given specific direction, shares held in the name of that organization may not be voted and will not be considered as present and entitled to vote on any matter to be considered at the annual meeting,
except with respect to the ratification of the company&#146;s independent auditors. <B>Brokers are not permitted to vote your shares for the election of directors, for the advisory vote on executive compensation, for the advisory vote on frequency
of the vote on executive compensation, for the approval of the 2017 long term</B> </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right">4 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">
<B>incentive plan or for or against the stockholder proposal without your instructions as to</B> <B>how to vote. Please instruct your broker how to vote your shares using the voting instruction
form provided by your broker. The voting instruction forms provided by your bank, broker or other nominee will also include information about how to vote your shares over the internet or telephonically, if such options are available. Please return
your completed voting instruction form to your broker and contact the person responsible for your account or vote by internet or telephone so that your vote can be counted. </B> </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I>How do I vote my shares? </I></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">You may vote your shares using one of the following methods (please also see the information provided above concerning the
difference between holding shares as a holder of record or registered holder and holding shares beneficially through a bank, broker or other nominee&#151;beneficial holders should follow the voting instructions provided by such nominee): </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="16%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="21%"></TD>

<TD VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000" BGCOLOR="#26962d"><FONT COLOR="#ffffff"><B>Over the internet</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-right:2pt">If you have access to the internet, you can submit your proxy online by following the instructions included
on your proxy card or Notice (or voting instruction form in the case of beneficial holders for whom internet voting is available) for voting over the internet.</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em">


<IMG SRC="g318595g85i82.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
</P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" BGCOLOR="#26962d" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000" BGCOLOR="#26962d"><FONT COLOR="#ffffff"><B>By telephone</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-right:2pt">You can vote by calling a toll-free telephone number listed on the proxy card (or voting instruction form in the case of beneficial
holders for whom telephone voting is available). Please refer to your proxy card or voting instruction form for instructions on voting by phone.</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em">


<IMG SRC="g318595g64o24.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
</P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" BGCOLOR="#26962d" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000" BGCOLOR="#26962d"><FONT COLOR="#ffffff"><B>By mail</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-right:2pt">You may vote your shares by completing, signing and mailing the proxy card included with your proxy materials (or voting instruction form
in the case of beneficial holders). Please refer to your proxy card or voting instruction form for instructions on voting by mail.</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em">


<IMG SRC="g318595g94d70.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
</P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" BGCOLOR="#26962d" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000" BGCOLOR="#26962d"><FONT COLOR="#ffffff"><B>In person at the annual meeting</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-right:2pt">Stockholders are invited to attend the annual meeting and vote in person at the annual meeting. If you are a beneficial owner of shares
you must obtain a legal proxy from the bank, broker or other holder of record of your shares to be entitled to vote those shares in person at the meeting.</TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">A control number, located on the instruction sheet attached to the proxy card or Notice, is
designated to verify your identity and allow you to vote your shares and confirm that your voting instructions have been recorded properly. If you vote via the internet or by telephone, there is no need to return a signed proxy card. However, you
may still vote by proxy by using the proxy card. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">As noted above, if you hold shares beneficially in street name through a
bank, broker or other nominee, you may vote by submitting the enclosed voting instruction form. Telephone and internet voting may be also available&#151;please refer to the voting instruction form provided by your bank, broker or other nominee for
more information. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right">5 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>

<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I>Can I change my vote? </I></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">Yes. You may revoke the proxy at any time prior to its use by: </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt">delivering a written notice to the secretary of the company, mailed to Hess Corporation, 1185&nbsp;Avenue of
the Americas, New York, New York 10036; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt">executing and submitting a later-dated proxy; </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt">re-voting your shares by telephone or on the internet; or </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt">attending the annual meeting and voting in person. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I>What vote is required to approve each of the proposals? </I></B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt"><I>Proposal 1: Election of directors</I>: Directors will be elected by a majority of votes cast, which means
that the number of shares voted &#147;for&#148; a director&#146;s election exceeds 50% of the number of votes cast with respect to that director&#146;s election. Abstentions and broker non-votes are not counted as votes cast. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt"><I>Proposal 2: Advisory vote to approve the compensation of the named executive officers</I>: Approval of this
proposal requires the affirmative vote of a majority of the shares present in person or represented by proxy and entitled to vote at the annual meeting. Abstentions will be counted as present for the purposes of this vote and will have the effect of
a vote against the proposal. Broker non-votes will not be counted as present and are not entitled to vote on the proposal. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt"><I>Proposal 3: Advisory vote on the frequency of voting on executive compensation</I>: Approval of this
proposal requires the affirmative vote of a majority of the shares present in person or represented by proxy and entitled to vote at the annual meeting. Abstentions will be counted as present for the purposes of this vote and will have the effect of
a vote against the proposal. Broker non-votes will not be counted as present and are not entitled to vote on the proposal. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt"><I>Proposal 4: Ratification of selection of independent registered public accountants</I>: Approval of this
proposal requires the affirmative vote of a majority of the shares present in person or represented by proxy and entitled to vote at the annual meeting. Abstentions and broker non-votes will be counted as present for purposes of this vote and will
have the effect of a vote against the proposal. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt"><I>Proposal 5: Approval of the 2017 long term incentive plan</I>: Approval of this proposal requires the
affirmative vote of a majority of the shares present in person or represented by proxy and entitled to vote at the annual meeting. Abstentions will be counted as present for the purposes of this vote and will have the effect of a vote against the
proposal. Broker non-votes will not be counted as present and are not entitled to vote on the proposal. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt"><I>Proposal 6: Stockholder proposal</I>: Approval of this proposal requires the affirmative vote of a majority
of the shares present in person or represented by proxy and entitled to vote at the annual meeting. Abstentions will be counted as present for the purposes of this vote and will have the effect of a vote against the proposal. Broker non-votes will
not be counted as present and are not entitled to vote on the proposal. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right">6 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I>What are the recommendations of the board of directors? </I></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">The board of directors recommends that you vote your shares on your proxy card: </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt"><B>FOR</B> the election of directors nominated herein; </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt"><B>FOR</B> the proposal to ratify the selection of Ernst&nbsp;&amp; Young LLP as independent auditors for the
fiscal year ending December&nbsp;31, 2017; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt"><B>AGAINST</B> the stockholder proposal recommending a scenario analysis report regarding carbon asset risk.
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I>What does it mean if I receive more than one proxy card on or about the same time? </I></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">It generally means you hold shares registered in more than one account. In order to vote all of your shares, please sign and
return each proxy card or, if you vote via the internet or telephone, vote once for each proxy card you receive. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B><I>What if I do not specify how I
want my shares to be voted? </I></B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:5%; font-size:12pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="justify">If you are the record holder of your shares and do not specify on your proxy card (or
when giving your proxy by telephone or the internet) how you want to vote your shares, your shares will be voted: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt"><B>FOR</B> the election of directors nominated herein; </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">

<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt"><B>FOR</B> the proposal to ratify the selection of Ernst&nbsp;&amp; Young LLP as independent auditors for the
fiscal year ending December&nbsp;31, 2017; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt"><B>FOR</B> the approval of the 2017 long term incentive plan; and </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:12pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
